Sequencing run sample renaming

Prepare files for dada2.
```{r libraries}
devtools::source_url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/strejcem/cleanSeqTools/master/R/cleanSeqTools.R")
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r check}
list.files("source", pattern = ".*csv", full.names = TRUE) %>% 
  read_csv(skip = 1, col_names = c("row", paste0("col", 1:12)), col_types = "cccccccccccc", id = "plate") %>% 
  pivot_longer(-1:-2, names_to = "col") %>%
  mutate(n = n(), .by = value) %>% 
  filter(n != 1) %>% 
  arrange(value)


```
